name: HHHalloween
description:
The story takes place in a small town full of rumours, where we will play as a little girl "Fire", collecting candies, dealing with small troubles, getting information from various NPCs, and finding the truth of the rumours about the "Halloween Devil". The game has three endings.
The game has three endings, each containing a different message. By reaching each ending, the story comes together in a way that may not be complete.
